data.heading: For Spend 3 hrs watching Cinemas
whatwedo: Watching a movie_ in a theater like Prozone sounds like a great plan for three hours!
Most movies have a runtime of around 1.5 to 2.5 hours so you should have enough time to enjoy a film and maybe even grab some snacks
Just make sure to check the movie schedule and choose one that fits within your timeframe

data.heading: Spend the 5 Hrs In BrookFiled
whatwedo:
Movie ( 3Hrs) : Many malls have cinemas where you can catch a film. Check the movie schedule and plan a movie viewing_
Dining ( 2 Hrs) :: Enjoy a leisurely meal at one of the mall's restaurants or food court. Try out different cuisines and treat yourself to some delicious food.
